duties_responsibilities.duty: Developing store strategies to raise customers’ pool, expand store traffic and optimize profitability.
Lead a team of store associates through hands-on mentorship and inspiration to build impeccable client relationships.
Create a culture of service and excellence, coaching the team to elevate all areas of business to provide unique client experiences.
Ensure the store remains clean, presentable, and well-stocked at all times, with a focus on visual appeal and organization.
Deliver exceptional customer service by addressing inquiries, resolving complaints, and handling returns or exchanges in a prompt and professional manner.
Collaborate with the store team to achieve common goals and maintain a positive work environment.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Retail Management, or related field (Master's preferred)
